Crumbling Codex

A guide to the ruins of Krümblegård.

How to start

1) Explore until you find a Haunted Waystone.
2) Right-click it to begin the encounter.
3) The arena forms and Krümblegård emerges.

Survival tips

- Krümblegård grows more dangerous each phase.
- Watch for new attack patterns as the fight escalates.
- Stay mobile during ranged attacks.

Rewards

Defeat Krümblegård to earn a Runic Core.
Use it to craft Runic tools.
